comment: Cool idea, and some fun humour in the game, but I found that the dexterity element of the game was just too fiddly for me, and the other game elements were very average. Would rather play any one of a number of better dexterity games.
Zabawka dla dzieci
NEVER BUY THIS FOR ME EVER AGAIN!!!
Quasi-dexterity game with few interesting choices. Nice components. Terrible game.
Good for playing kitchen
Not for me.
Nice components and a fun activity but the disgusting dishes & art made me sell it.
Kids hated this, it made one of them cry.
É um jogo simples de destreza, eu gostei mas não tem muita profundidade, vale para jogar com crianças!
Sold
Ok game. Too simplistic and does jot engage me.
Plays with expansions included.

Each player receives a miniature pan and a hotplate. Then each turn you can either attempt to turn up the heat, season your dish, or attempt to steal another cook's recipe in the making. It's a good game to play with kids but for adults it's not enough imo.

This is a fun little dexterity game. I thought it would be a bigger hit with the family than it was. This is also a game where it adds a bit too much for my taste. Sometimes I feel like games try to do too much when they have just a simple straight forward game.
more toy then game
Componentes extra.
Evergreen

12

Unikt barnspel

This is a perfect example of what a family game should be : plays quickly, almost no downtime, bits are wonderful, no pasted-on theme (it really feels like you're cooking some meals!), unique, interesting tactical choices, loads of fun... what else? A keeper!
Great family fun. Have to get my hands on a new copy...
A very unique and fun game for all ages.
